title: 生产统计
text:
Preface
这是一本公司生产数据可视化书.

title: 1  Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See 樊志伟 (2026) for additional discussion of literate programming.

1 + 1

[1] 2






樊志伟. 2026. “生产统计.” Comput. J. 27 (2): 97–111. https://doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/27.2.97.

title: 4  化验分析指标
text:
4.5 矩阵

e1<-hc_d  %>%  drop_na() %>% e_chart(时间)  %>% e_line(serie = `51排放气甲醇`) %>%  e_x_axis(splitNumber = 2) %>% e_mark_line(data=list(yAxis = 50)) %>%  e_tooltip(trigger='axis') %>%  e_visual_map(type='piecewise',pieces=list(list(min=50,max=1000,color='red'),list(min=0,max=50,color='blue')),show=FALSE)  %>% e_legend(show=FALSE) %>% e_tooltip()
e2<-hc_d  %>%  drop_na() %>% e_chart(时间)  %>% e_line(serie = `52排放气甲醇`) %>%  e_x_axis(splitNumber = 2) %>% e_mark_line(data=list(yAxis = 50)) %>%  e_tooltip(trigger='axis') %>%  e_visual_map(type='piecewise',pieces=list(list(min=50,max=1000,color='red'),list(min=0,max=50,color='blue')),show=FALSE) %>% e_tooltip()   %>% e_legend(show=FALSE)
e3<-hc_d  %>%  drop_na() %>% e_chart(时间)  %>% e_line(serie = `53排放气甲醇`) %>%  e_x_axis(splitNumber = 2) %>% e_mark_line(data=list(yAxis = 50)) %>%  e_tooltip(trigger='axis') %>%  e_visual_map(type='piecewise',pieces=list(list(min=50,max=1000,color='red'),list(min=0,max=50,color='blue')),show=FALSE) %>% e_tooltip()   %>% e_legend(show=FALSE)
e4<-hc_d  %>%  drop_na() %>% e_chart(时间)  %>% e_line(serie = `54排放气甲醇`) %>%  e_x_axis(splitNumber = 2) %>% e_mark_line(data=list(yAxis = 50)) %>%  e_tooltip(trigger='axis') %>%  e_visual_map(type='piecewise',pieces=list(list(min=50,max=1000,color='red'),list(min=0,max=50,color='blue')),show=FALSE) %>% e_tooltip()   %>% e_legend(show=FALSE)
e5<-hc_d  %>%  drop_na() %>% e_chart(时间)  %>% e_line(serie = `51排放气总S`) %>%  e_x_axis(splitNumber = 2) %>% e_mark_line(data=list(yAxis = 45.5)) %>%  e_tooltip(trigger='axis') %>%  e_visual_map(type='piecewise',pieces=list(list(min=45.5,max=1000,color='red'),list(min=0,max=45.5,color='blue')),show=FALSE)  %>% e_legend(show=FALSE) %>% e_tooltip()
e6<-hc_d  %>%  drop_na() %>% e_chart(时间)  %>% e_line(serie = `52排放气总S`) %>%  e_x_axis(splitNumber = 2) %>% e_mark_line(data=list(yAxis = 45.5)) %>%  e_tooltip(trigger='axis') %>%  e_visual_map(type='piecewise',pieces=list(list(min=45.5,max=1000,color='red'),list(min=0,max=45.5,color='blue')),show=FALSE) %>% e_tooltip()   %>% e_legend(show=FALSE)
e7<-hc_d  %>%  drop_na() %>% e_chart(时间)  %>% e_line(serie = `53排放气总S`) %>%  e_x_axis(splitNumber = 2) %>% e_mark_line(data=list(yAxis = 45.5)) %>%  e_tooltip(trigger='axis') %>%  e_visual_map(type='piecewise',pieces=list(list(min=45.5,max=1000,color='red'),list(min=0,max=45.5,color='blue')),show=FALSE) %>% e_tooltip()   %>% e_legend(show=FALSE)
e8<-hc_d  %>%  drop_na() %>% e_chart(时间)  %>% e_line(serie = `54排放气总S`) %>%  e_x_axis(splitNumber = 2) %>% e_mark_line(data=list(yAxis = 45.5)) %>%  e_tooltip(trigger='axis') %>%  e_visual_map(type='piecewise',pieces=list(list(min=45.5,max=1000,color='red'),list(min=0,max=45.5,color='blue')),show=FALSE) %>% e_tooltip()   %>% e_legend(show=FALSE)
e9<-hc_d  %>%  drop_na() %>% e_chart(时间)  %>% e_line(serie = `51排放气甲烷`) %>%  e_x_axis(splitNumber = 2) %>% e_mark_line(data=list(yAxis = 0.93)) %>%  e_tooltip(trigger='axis') %>%  e_visual_map(type='piecewise',pieces=list(list(min=0.93,max=1000,color='red'),list(min=0,max=0.93,color='blue')),show=FALSE)  %>% e_legend(show=FALSE) %>% e_tooltip()
e10<-hc_d  %>%  drop_na() %>% e_chart(时间)  %>% e_line(serie = `52排放气甲烷`) %>%  e_x_axis(splitNumber = 2) %>% e_mark_line(data=list(yAxis = 0.93)) %>%  e_tooltip(trigger='axis') %>%  e_visual_map(type='piecewise',pieces=list(list(min=0.93,max=1000,color='red'),list(min=0,max=0.93,color='blue')),show=FALSE) %>% e_tooltip()   %>% e_legend(show=FALSE)
e11<-hc_d  %>%  drop_na() %>% e_chart(时间)  %>% e_line(serie = `53排放气甲烷`) %>%  e_x_axis(splitNumber = 2) %>% e_mark_line(data=list(yAxis = 0.93)) %>%  e_tooltip(trigger='axis') %>%  e_visual_map(type='piecewise',pieces=list(list(min=0.93,max=1000,color='red'),list(min=0,max=0.93,color='blue')),show=FALSE) %>% e_tooltip()   %>% e_legend(show=FALSE)
e12<-hc_d  %>%  drop_na() %>% e_chart(时间)  %>% e_line(serie = `54排放气甲烷`) %>%  e_x_axis(splitNumber = 2) %>% e_mark_line(data=list(yAxis = 0.93)) %>%  e_tooltip(trigger='axis') %>%  e_visual_map(type='piecewise',pieces=list(list(min=0.93,max=1000,color='red'),list(min=0,max=0.93,color='blue')),show=FALSE) %>% e_tooltip()   %>% e_legend(show=FALSE)
df<-data.frame('单元'=rep(c("51单元", "52单元", "53单元", "54单元"),each = 3),'指标'=c('低甲排放气甲醇','低甲排放气总硫','低甲排放气甲烷'))
df %>% 
    e_charts()  %>%  
    e_matrix(xAxis = '单元', yAxis = '指标') %>% 
    e_matrix_addChart(chart = e1, id = "chart1", coord = c(0,0)) %>% 
    e_matrix_addChart(chart = e2, id = "chart2", coord = c(1,0)) %>% 
    e_matrix_addChart(chart = e3, id = "chart3", coord = c(2,0)) %>% 
    e_matrix_addChart(chart = e4, id = "chart4", coord = c(3,0))  %>% 
    e_matrix_addChart(chart = e5, id = "chart5", coord = c(0,1))  %>% 
    e_matrix_addChart(chart = e6, id = "chart6", coord = c(1,1))  %>% 
    e_matrix_addChart(chart = e7, id = "chart7", coord = c(2,1))  %>% 
    e_matrix_addChart(chart = e8, id = "chart8", coord = c(3,1)) %>% 
    e_matrix_addChart(chart = e9, id = "chart9", coord = c(0,2)) %>% 
    e_matrix_addChart(chart = e10, id = "chart10", coord = c(1,2)) %>% 
    e_matrix_addChart(chart = e11, id = "chart11", coord = c(2,2)) %>% 
    e_matrix_addChart(chart = e12, id = "chart12", coord = c(3,2))
